Name: Puzzle With Your Friends
About the game: Puzzle alone, with or against your friends - several artworks from indie-games and artists are available! Beside the singleplayer-mode the game offers several multiplayer-modes. Play a relaxed puzzle together with your friends on Steam or challenge them to exciting matches! FEATURES Singleplayer- and different multiplayer-modes (Co-Op and Versus) 37 fantastic and hand-drawn artworks from different artists and indie-games Compete with your friends and other players on the Steam Leaderboards Integrated multiplayer chat-system Includes Trading-Cards, Achievements and Emoticons!
